"Xiandy": "At this time of year, enemies' appearance may change."

"Some manner of glowing pattern appears on the outside of their bodies...
We call it a Season Symbol."
"We have not yet been able to determine the cause, but we are conducting research and collecting as much data as we can."
"If you encounter such enemies, I would be grateful if you would provide me with your combat data."
"I have sent detailed information about these enemies to that terminal, so please consult it at your leisure."
"There are also special rewards available to those who cooperate with our research."
"I leave the matter in your capable hands."
